com.rivieracode.lib.vault.algo

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivieracode.lib.vault.algo.Util

  • public class Util
extends Object
    Embeds helpers to manipulate keys and messages.
    Author:
    Jean-Michel

    • Method Detail

      • concatChunks

        public static byte[] concatChunks(List<byte[]> list)
        Concatenates chunks of bytes. Each chunk is prefixed with its length coded on 4 bytes. 2.1Go is the maximum length per chunk.
        Parameters:
        list - the byre arrays to concatenate
        Returns:
        the concatenation in a single byte array

      • concatChunks

        public static byte[] concatChunks(byte[]... chunks)
        Concatenates chunks of bytes. Each chunk is prefixed with its length coded on 4 bytes. 2.1Go is the maximum length per chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunks - the byte arrays to concatenate
        Returns:
        the concatenation in a single byte array

      • splitChunks

        public static List<byte[]> splitChunks(byte[] concatenation)
        Discovers and extracts each chunk from a concatenated byte array. This operation is the reverse of concatChunks.
        Parameters:
        concatenation - the concatenated byte array containing prefixed chunks
        Returns:
        the list of extracted chunks

      • intToByteArray

        public static byte[] intToByteArray(int value)
        Converts an int value to a 4 byte array.
        Parameters:
        value - the int number to convert
        Returns:
        the 4 byte array

        Converts a 4 byte array to an int value.

        Returns:
        the converted int value

      • createSignature

        public static byte[] createSignature(byte[] message,
                                     PrivateKey privateKey)
                              throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                     InvalidKeyException,
                                     SignatureException
        Calculates the signature with an SHA1 hash function signed by the RSA private key.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to sign
        privateKey - the private key certifying the authentication
        Returns:
        the signature of the message
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the version of Java is too old
        InvalidKeyException - if the privateKey is invalid
        SignatureException - if the signature could not be created

      • verifySignature

        public static void verifySignature(byte[] message,
                                   byte[] sentSignature,
                                   PublicKey publicKey)
                            throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                   InvalidKeyException,
                                   SignatureException,
                                   Exception
        Authenticates a message from the signature.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to authenticate
        sentSignature - the signature for the message
        publicKey - the public key pairing the private key used to create the signature
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the version of Java is too old
        InvalidKeyException - if the privateKey is invalid
        SignatureException - if the signature could not be created
        Exception - if signature is invalid

      • generateRandomKey

        public static String generateRandomKey(int length)
        Generates a random phrase with readable characters.
        Parameters:
        length - the size of the random phrase
        Returns:
        the random phrase

      • getKeyPair

        public static KeyPair getKeyPair(KeyStore keystore,
                                 String alias,
                                 char[] aliasPassword)
                          throws UnrecoverableKeyException,
                                 KeyStoreException,
                                 NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Retrieves public and private keys from a key store.
        Parameters:
        keystore - the key store with the private and public key
        alias - the alias of the key in the key store
        aliasPassword - the password for the alias in the key store
        Returns:
        the KeyPair with private and public keys for the alias
        Throws:
        UnrecoverableKeyException - if key is not valid
        KeyStoreException - if key store is not valid
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the Java version is old
